DOC.detailed_description: The propose study double blind , placebo control , parallel design investigation compare effect one four atypical antipsychotic ( aripiprazole , olanzapine , quetiapine , and/or risperidone ) , treatment alone treatment one addition treatment guanfacine maximum dose 3.0 mg per day cognitive task performance schizophrenic patient . The study take place fourteen week . Patients receive study medication last ten week protocol .
